summary: A reformed frat boy opens an antique store in a college town, and falls for the free-spirited girl who moves into the apartment above his shop. In time, this unlikely pair fall into a traditional courtship..
cast: Elizabeth Roberts|Rik Swartzwelder|LeJon Woods|Tyler Hollinger|Nini Hadjis|Maryanne Nagel|Lindsay Heath|Joseph Bonamico|Dorothy Silver|Ange'le Perez|Anne Marie Nestor|Frank Jones Jr.|Todd McCune|William K. Baker|Stephen R. Campanella|Kevin Fox|Eric Frank|Marie A. Garton|Frank Huff|Kilina Jellel|Ron Kidd|McKenzie Mack|John Nicolozakes|Kathy Vogel|Jonathan Yurco|Jason Botsford|Christopher Butturff|Rene' Perez|Maria Perossa|Tom Shafer
title: Old Fashioned
